actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide a presumption of service connection for the occurrence of post-traumatic stress disorders in veterans who served in Southeast Asia during the Vietnam era.
short_title: Vietnam Veterans Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder Compensation Act

summary.text: Vietnam Veterans Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder Compensation Act - Creates a presumption of service-connection for disability purposes for veterans suffering from a post-traumatic stress disorder after serving in Southeast Asia during the Vietnam era.

titles.title: Vietnam Veterans Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder Compensation Act

A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide a presumption of service connection for the occurrence of post-traumatic stress disorders in veterans who served in Southeast Asia during the Vietnam era.
